content.html:
Warm Up Activity

Your teacher will assign you one of these expressions:

\( \dfrac {n^2 - 9}{2(4-3)}\qquad \text{or} \qquad (n+3)\cdot \dfrac {n-3}{8-3\cdot2} \)

Evaluate your expression when \( n \) is:

a. \(5\)
b. \(7\)
c. \(13\)
d. \(-1\)

Enter your answers in the box below:

For both expressions, the values are:

a. \(8\)
b. \(20\)
c. \(80\)
d. \(-4\)
